EmailTemplate.description: To send ITS invoice with 3rd party backup
EmailTemplate.name: ITS Invoice with backup
EmailTemplate.subject: International Trip Support Invoice(s)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Attached please find your invoice(s) for International Trip Support along with supporting documentation.
Please note that the Honeywell / Jetex invoice(s) with attachment labeled "Invoice 49T..." is payable. The additional attachments are for your reference and support the charges on the payable invoice.
If you have any questions or need further assistance please let us know. Thank you,
GoDirect Flight Services Accounts
Honeywell | Aerospace
GoDirect Flight Services
602.365.7020 x6
fssaccounts@honeywell.com
https:\\ aerospace.honeywell.com
________________________________________________
